title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
has found out the origin location of these enchantments that has been placed on the tadpoles. You will have the following dialogue options.

Tell me what you've learned about the tadpoles' origins. This magic isn't typical of how mind flayers procreate? So all of this was for nothing. You learned all this from your studies?

Choosing dialogue 1 will have Halsin talk about the information he knows about the tadpoles. You will have the following dialogue options.

You seem to know a lot about thi
